topic.title: Chapter 7: The Rose & True Love's Power

body.p: As the last petal of the enchanted rose was about to fall, the Beast grew weaker but wanted to make the most of his remaining time with Belle. He planned a huge holiday celebration for her arrival, unaware that Maurice would be coming too.

Belle and Maurice returned to the castle just in time for Christmas, dinner awaited them on the massive mahogany dinner table, with dishes like beef rafu, cheese souffle, and some “grey stuff”, smelling much more exotic than her usual Cubano sandwich. Her friends, Cogsworth, Lumiere, Mrs. Potts, and Armoire, were all gathered with the Beast, waiting for her. They poured lemonade, shared festive stories, and enjoyed their meal together. They popped a bottle of champagne, shared festive stories, and enjoyed their meal together.

After dinner, the Beast invited everyone to the large ballroom with golden arches. Since Maurice had previously missed salsa night with Belle, the Beast had arranged a full band of enchanted household items to play Celia Cruz’s “La Vida es un Carnaval” for them to salsa dance to, with all the castle’s residents joining in.

Suddenly, the Beast fell collapsed and everyone shrieked in horror. Belle rushed to his side, but he wasn’t breathing. She tried performing CPR in hopes he would awaken, but nothing worked. Overcome with grief, Belle cried “Beast, please wake up. I am in love with you and don’t know what I would do without you!” She kissed him and with that kiss started a castle-wide transformation. Pink sparkles and fairy dust spread around the castle as the beast and all the enchanted objects turned into humans.

Belle was overwhelmed with emotion. Just moments before, she had a hairy Beast in front of her; now a handsome prince with long red hair lay before her. If it weren’t for his bright blue ocean eyes, she wouldn’t have believed it to be the Beast. He gently wiped away Belle’s tears while confessing his love. “Only a beauty like you could tame a beast like me,” he said, and they live happily ever after.
